examples.description: Addresses class imbalance issues in sleep stage classification using hybrid-channel EEG signals and specialized feature extraction techniques.
examples.note: Added for its approach to handling class imbalance, a common problem in fatigue detection datasets, using specialized feature extraction from hybrid-channel EEG signals.

all_upper_levels.title: Addressing Data Scarcity and Class Imbalance
all_upper_levels.section_id: 7 Addressing Data Scarcity and Class Imbalance
